battleLog.attackCommentary: From the opening bell, tiny titan BROWN FIELD MOUSE throws a surprise dart, landing a LIGHT HIT on Victor Moreau! It's a taste of what's to come in this unexpected.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The tiny field mouse attempts a desperate flurry of clambering jabs against the unrelenting pressure from Moreau. Can this unorthodox start-up survive Round 1's onslaught.

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau opens round two with a calculated strike landing on the tiny titan!  The field mouse is staggered but won't go down so easily.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The crowd erupts as Moreau narrowly avoids a flurry from Brown Field Mouse's unexpected combo! This round hinges on Moreau's calculated defense - can he withstand the pressure and set.

battleLog.attackCommentary: The tiny titan of The Squeak stands against Moreau's might in round three! A single nibble connects for a measly ONE damage point - but don't underestimate the FIELD MOUSE.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Round 3 intensity is OFF THE CHARTS! Can Brown manage a last-ditch counter as Victor Moreau presses their legendary defensive against the tiny titan's fury.
battleLog.randomEvent: brown field mouse uses undefined in their attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau presses the attack in round 4, a single precise strike landing for a sliver of damage against the tenacious brown field mouse. Can this early lead swing the momentum.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau presses for the finish in round 4, but the tiny titan is proving unexpectedly slippery! Can he weather this onslaught of strikes and turn the tables.

battleLog.attackCommentary: The pressure's on in round five! A desperate little nibble from Brown Field Mouse connects with a sliver of damage against Victor Moreau, but will it be enough to swing.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The pressure's immense as Squeak attempts a last stand against the calculated Moreau. Can this tiny titan weather the onslaught in round 5, or will Victor claim victory with a.

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau presses forward with a relentless assault! A single calculated poke lands, but Brown's nimble field mouse character could still wriggle free from this opening.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The crowd chants as Moreau presses the offensive in round 6! But Brown Field Mouse shows uncanny defensive prowess, narrowly countering every surge and keeping Victor at bay.
